Meet Noelle and Callum! Christmas at the Coast is coming to you sometime mid-November! Noelle moves across the country after her childhood best friend tragically passes away. When she comes home for Christmas, she rekindles an old flame with her childhood best friends brother Callum. Throughout her stay they become more than they ever thought they could be and they walk through their grief together. üéÑ Thank you SO MUCH @markkksterling for making these characters come to life.
